meaning_str.bing:
n. 高度；高处；高地；高位
网络. 身高；的高度；顶点

高；高度；高地；高处；高位；身高；海拔；顶点；巅峰；极点；峰值；典型；鼎盛时期；最高级别；最高水平；更好；极端；最佳点

1.en: He made the G-Man brand so popular that, at its height, it was harder to become an FBI agent than to be accepted into an Ivy League college.
1.cn: 他把美国联邦调查局探员塑造成了一个流行品牌，在巅峰时期，想当一名联邦调查局探员比进一所常青藤院校还要难。

2.en: She said in the height of her trauma, she took pictures with the camera on her mobile phone, lest people should not believe her later.
2.cn: 她说她用手机拍摄了她遭受严重外伤的照片，以免之后人们不相信她。

3.en: The brain then adds them together as if they were natural, to create the impression of depth, as well as width and height.
3.cn: 然后大脑把这两个视频图像就象自然状态那样叠加在一起，从而产生具有深度以及宽度和高度的景象。

0.en: Max, in my country, I'm average height.
0.cn: Max 我这身高在韩国是平均高度。

1.en: So my head's now about 12 meters, which is about the height of a four-storey building and also the height of a sauropod.
1.cn: 我的头位于十二米高处，差不多是四层楼的高度，也就是蜥脚龙的身高。

2.en: From that height it will be invisible! No one will have any idea! And what do I do when I get to the first cavaletti?
2.cn: 在那个高度看不见，没人会知道。走到第一个卡瓦拉帝时怎么办？

3.en: So, I think if we want to predict the height of the wave, we need to use elasticity theory and model the lattice as one continuous flexible piece.
3.cn: 我觉得如果想预测起伏的高度，我们需要用到弹性理论还要将格架作为一个连续柔性块的模型。

4.en: Every second you waste on changing into your superhero costume and flying up to her height, her head is getting that much closer to the pavement!
4.cn: 你每多浪费一秒钟去换你的超级英雄战袍然后飞到她所处的高度，她的头离地面的距离会越来越近！

5.en: Plain lo in the morning. Lola in slacks. Lois Lane. Come see the view. Now the secret to the height is the building material.
5.cn: 早上她是普通的洛，穿上宽松便裤时是洛拉，露易丝·莱恩。过来看看这风景，高度的秘诀，在于建造所用的材料。

6.en: Not height, vision, athleticism, or ability to digest dairy products.
6.cn: 绝非在身高，视力，运动能力或消化乳制品这几个领域吧。

7.en: Right here is where my mom used to mark my height.
7.cn: 那里就是我妈以前测量我身高的地方。

8.en: The middle finger alone is the height of a three-story building.
8.cn: 仅一只中指就有三层楼高。

9.en: Thousands of precarious peaks reach up to three times the height to the Empire State Building.
9.cn: 万千险峰，高耸入云，高达三个帝国大厦。

10.en: That is why I crossed the Lu river at the height of summer, and entered the wastelands beyond.

11.en: Who did I put in jail? Pizza delivery guy. Seemed the right height, build. He gave you a pretty good fight.
11.cn: 被我关进监狱的是谁？送披萨的。身高体型都很合适。他还和你好好打了一架。

12.en: You remember her from my birthday party two years ago. She's yeah, like, average height, medium build, bald.
12.cn: 她来参加过我的生日派对，体重平均，身高适中，光头…

13.en: Horse, but mostly just for the height. A little bit for the genital girth. Wrong, and let's keep it clean, shall we?
13.cn: 我选马，主要是因为马比较高，其次是因为生殖器比较大。错，能让这话题保持点格调吗？

14.en: I did it in an analog world. I was blessed with a platform that at its height reached nearly 20 million viewers a day.
14.cn: 我就是在与此类似的环境中达到目标的，我很幸运地建立了一个平台，其单日最高点击量达两千万人次。

15.en: The twelve hundred year old Leshan Buddha at 233 feet, four times the height of the Mount Rushmore carvings. It's the world's largest Buddhist statue.
15.cn: 一千两百岁的乐山大佛，通高七十一米，是拉什莫尔山雕塑的四倍，是世界上最宏大的佛雕。

16.en: Three times the height of the Eifel Tower and twice the size of the Empire State Building, the tip of this modern wonder can be seen from 60 miles away.
16.cn: 比巴黎铁塔高三倍、也比帝国大厦大两倍，远在 90 公里外也能看到这座现代奇观的顶端。
